name: Enrollment Gaps Report
query:
SELECT
    "Missing Program" AS type,
    s.name AS student,
    s.student_full_name AS student_name,
    NULL AS program,
    NULL AS course,
    NULL AS term,
    "Program" AS missing
FROM `tabStudent` s
WHERE s.enabled = 1
  AND s.name NOT IN (
    SELECT pe.student FROM `tabProgram Enrollment` pe WHERE pe.academic_year = %(academic_year)s
  )

UNION
SELECT
    "Missing Student Group" AS type,
    pe.student,
    pe.student_name,
    pe.program,
    pec.course,
    pec.term_start AS term,
    "Student Group" AS missing
FROM `tabProgram Enrollment` pe
INNER JOIN `tabProgram Enrollment Course` pec ON pec.parent = pe.name
WHERE pe.academic_year = %(academic_year)s
  AND pec.status = 'Enrolled'
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM `tabStudent Group` sg
    INNER JOIN `tabStudent Group Student` sgs ON sgs.parent = sg.name
    WHERE sg.group_based_on = 'Course'
      AND sg.academic_year = pe.academic_year
      AND sg.course = pec.course
      AND sg.term = pec.term_start
      AND sgs.student = pe.student
  )
